Experiences.title: Work experience
Experiences.text: I have been working as a front-end developer since 2013, when I joined Sou Digital. In the last years I worked on Meu Rosinha, on Sonica, and with other side projects. I'm currently building Hero a smart assistant for MySide Personal Shoppers.

list.title: Front-End Developer at MySide
description: Developed Hero, an internal intelligent assistant used daily by 40+ Personal Shoppers for real estate service and negotiation workflows.
Used AI tools during development to generate components, business logic, and automated tests, optimizing implementation time and solution experimentation.

Built two main products: a mobile PWA with AI-integrated chat for querying developments, builders, and property types, plus a negotiation pipeline module with task and event management; and a desktop application featuring negotiation management, property search, and an interactive presentation tool used during initial strategic client meetings.
Designed and implemented front-end architecture using React 19, Next.js 15 (App Router) and TypeScript, focusing on scalability, performance, and modular organization.
Implemented offline-first strategies with Service Workers, IndexedDB, and cache persistence, ensuring continuous application usage even under unstable connectivity.
Structured unit and component testing using Jest and React Testing Library.

list.title: Front-End Developer at Meu Rosinha
description: Development of several projects including a website, a web application, and an online store. In the past I also worked on legacy projects.
Migrated and upgraded the stack to React, Next.js, and TypeScript, ensuring greater scalability, maintainability, and long-term technical sustainability.
Re-architected the front-end structure focusing on componentization and reuse, reducing complexity and enabling continuous product evolution.
Directly contributed to supporting and growing a user base of 1,200+ subscribers through ongoing improvements and the development of new features such as a WhatsApp module and catalog expansion.
Actively participated in the visual identity rebranding, delivering a more consistent, modern interface aligned with the brand’s positioning.

list.title: Front-End/Full-Stack Developer at Sou Digital
description: Contributed to the design and development of websites, landing pages, web applications, e-commerce platforms, and proprietary systems, supporting the technical evolution and scalability of company solutions.
Delivered 200+ projects throughout career for national and international clients across multiple industries.
Actively contributed to the evolution of a proprietary CMS, implementing structural improvements that accelerated module creation and content management processes by at least 2x.
Built complex interfaces focused on performance, code organization, and architectural standardization using HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, jQuery, and Webpack.
In specific projects, also worked as a Full-Stack developer, building integrations and back-end features using PHP, Laravel, MySQL (Eloquent), OpenCart, and platforms such as Tray.

list.title: Front-End Developer at Sonica
description: Worked on the development of the no-code platform Sonica during the early years of the startup within Sou Digital, directly contributing to the product’s evolution and consolidation.
Actively collaborated with the technical team on platform development using HTML, CSS, Sass, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery, Webpack, PHP, and Laravel.
Implemented new features and interface fixes for both generated websites and the platform’s CMS.
Contributed to the creation of projects published on the platform, supporting real-world validation and continuous experience improvement.
